scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This small collection contains material on actions by unions and other labor groups regarding the Three Mile Island incident and efforts to improve conditions and employment in the energy and construction industries. The main actions covered in the collection are the first National Labor Conference for Safe Energy and Full Employment held in Pittsburgh in 1980 and the national march for safe energy and jobs in Harrisburg in 1981. The collection contains correspondence, clippings, maps, and many fliers.
